mainBoard.name: Nightmare
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare’s power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Sengir Vampire
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

mainBoard.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

mainBoard.name: Vampire Noble

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

foreignData.flavorText: „Eine herkömmliche Armee verköstigen zu müssen ist eine Frage der Logistik. Bei Zombies ist das eher ein Vorteil. Ihr Hunger ist der Grund, warum sie kämpfen. Ihr Hunger ist der Grund, warum man sie fürchtet." —Jadar, Ghulrufer aus Nefalen
foreignData.name: Wandelnde Leiche

foreignData.flavorText: "La alimentación de un ejército normal supone un problema de logística. Con los zombies, es una ventaja. Su alimentación es aquello por lo que luchan. Su alimentación es aquello por lo que se les teme." —Jadar, llamamuertos de Nephalia
foreignData.name: Cadáver ambulante

foreignData.flavorText: « Nourrir une armée normale revient à résoudre un problème de logistique. Avec des zombies, pas de problème, bien au contraire. Ils combattent pour se nourrir. C'est même pour ça qu'on les redoute. » —Jadar, meneur de goule de Néphalie
foreignData.name: Cadavre ambulant

foreignData.flavorText: "Sfamare un esercito normale è un problema di logistica. Con gli zombie, è un vantaggio. La fame è il motivo per cui combattono. La fame è il motivo per cui sono temuti." —Jadar, evocaghoul di Nephalia
foreignData.name: Cadavere Ambulante

foreignData.flavorText: 「普通の軍隊の場合、食糧確保が問題となる。ゾンビの場合、それが強みになる。奴らは食うために戦い、食うから恐れられる。」 ――ネファリアのグール呼び、ジャダー
foreignData.name: 歩く死骸
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ

foreignData.flavorText: "식량 보급은 일반 부대에는 골치 아픈 문제이지만 좀비에게는 오히려 긍정적인 요소이다. 허기는 좀비들이 싸우는 이유이며, 적이 그들을 두려워하는 원인이기 때문이다." —네팔리아의 악귀소환술사 자다르
foreignData.name: 걸어다니는 시체

foreignData.flavorText: "A alimentação de um exército normal é um problema de logística. A alimentação de zumbis é uma vantagem. Eles lutam para comer. E são temidos por isso." — Jadar, invocador de carniçais de Nefália
foreignData.name: Cadáver Ambulante

foreignData.flavorText: «Для обычной армии пища — это проблема снабжения. Для армии зомби — тактическое преимущество. Их пища — это то, почему они сражаются. Их пища — это то, почему их боятся». — Джадар, призыватель упырей из Нефалии
foreignData.name: Ходячий Труп

foreignData.flavorText: 「正常的军队要考虑食粮补给的问题。而这正是灵俑部队的优点。他们因进食而战。也因进食而被人惧怕。」 ～涅非利亚尸鬼牧者贾达
foreignData.name: 行尸

foreignData.flavorText: 「正常的軍隊要考慮食糧補給的問題。而這正是殭屍部隊的優點。他們因進食而戰。也因進食而被人懼怕。」 ～涅非利亞屍鬼牧者賈達
foreignData.name: 行屍

mainBoard.name: Walking Corpse

mainBoard.flavorText: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now *that's* dangerous."

foreignData.flavorText: „Eldrazi? Ha! Versuch mal, nachts mit vollen Taschen durch Zulaport zu laufen. Das ist gefährlich!"
foreignData.name: Zulaport-Mordgeselle
foreignData.text: Immer wenn der Zulaport-Mordgeselle oder eine andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, verliert jeder Gegner 1 Lebenspunkt, und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Eldrazi? ¡Ja! Prueba a caminar por Zulaport de noche con los bolsillos llenos. Eso sí es peligroso".
foreignData.name: Degollador de Zulaport
foreignData.text: Siempre que el Degollador de Zulaport u otra criatura que controlas muera, cada oponente pierde 1 vida y tú ganas 1 vida.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les Eldrazi ? Quelle blague ! Essayez donc de traverser Zulaport de nuit avec les poches pleines. Ça c'est dangereux. »
foreignData.name: Surineur de Zulaport
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que le Surineur de Zulaport ou qu'une autre créature que vous contrôlez meurt, chaque adversaire perd 1 point de vie et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
foreignData.type: Créature : humain et gredin et allié

foreignData.flavorText: "Eldrazi? Ah! Prova a camminare di notte per Zulaport con le tasche piene. Ecco, quello è pericoloso."
foreignData.name: Tagliagole di Zulaport
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta il Tagliagole di Zulaport o un'altra creatura che controlli muoiono, ogni avversario perde 1 punto vita e tu guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「エルドラージ？どうってことねぇな。ポケット膨らまして夜中のズーラポートを歩いてみな。それが身の危険さ。」
foreignData.name: ズーラポートの殺し屋
foreignData.text: ズーラポートの殺し屋かあなたがコントロールする他のクリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、各対戦相手はそれぞれ１点のライフを失い、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ならず者・同盟者

foreignData.flavorText: "엘드라지? 웃기는군! 지갑을 두둑이 채우고 한밤중에 줄라포트를 지나가 보라구. 그런 게 위험한 거지."
foreignData.name: 줄라포트 살인귀
foreignData.text: 줄라포트 살인귀나 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물이 죽을 때마다, 각 상대는 생명 1점을 잃고 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Eldrazi? Que nada! Tente andar por Zulaport à noite com os bolsos cheios. Isso sim é perigoso."
foreignData.name: Degolador de Zulaport
foreignData.text: Toda vez que Degolador de Zulaport ou outra criatura que você controla morre, cada oponente perde 1 ponto de vida e você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: «Эльдрази? Ха! Попробуй прогуляться вечером по Зулапорту с полными карманами. Вот это — настоящая опасность».
foreignData.name: Головорез из Зулапорта
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда Головорез из Зулапорта или другое существо под вашим контролем умирает, каждый оппонент теряет 1 жизнь, а вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreignData.flavorText: 「奥札奇？呵呵！不妨腰缠万贯时在夜晚来筑拉波走一遭。这才叫危险。」
foreignData.name: 筑拉波割喉客
foreignData.text: 每当筑拉波割喉客或另一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 「奧札奇？呵呵！不妨腰纏萬貫時在夜晚來筑拉波走一遭。這才叫危險。」
foreignData.name: 筑拉波割喉客
foreignData.text: 每當筑拉波割喉客或另一個由你操控的生物死去時，每位對手各失去1點生命且你獲得1點生命。

mainBoard.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: If another creature you control dies at the same time as Zulaport Cutthroat, its ability triggers for that creature.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Vastly outnumbered, the Zendikari found creative ways to even the odds.

foreignData.flavorText: Vollkommen in der Unterzahl, mussten sich die Zendikari kreative Mittel und Wege einfallen lassen, die Chancen auszugleichen.
foreignData.name: Knochenspreißel
foreignData.text: Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um Knochenspreißel zu wirken.Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Al verse totalmente superados en número, los zendikari buscaron formas creativas de equilibrar la balanza.
foreignData.name: Astillas óseas
foreignData.text: Como coste adicional para lanzar las Astillas óseas, sacrifica una criatura.Destruye la criatura objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: En nette infériorité numérique, les Zendikari trouvèrent des solutions inventives pour rétablir l'équilibre.
foreignData.name: Fragments d'os

foreignData.flavorText: In estrema inferiorità numerica, gli abitanti di Zendikar trovarono soluzioni creative per equilibrare lo scontro.
foreignData.name: Schegge d'Osso
foreignData.text: Come costo addizionale per lanciare le Schegge d'Osso, sacrifica una creatura.Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 数で勝るゼンディカーの住人たちは、勝ち目を五分にする独創的な手段を見つけた。

foreignData.flavorText: 수적 열세에 처한 젠디카르인들은 이 난국을 타개할 기발한 방법을 찾았다.
foreignData.name: 쪼개진 뼈 가시
foreignData.text: 쪼개진 뼈 가시를 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물을 희생한다.생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Muito inferiores em número, os zendikari encontraram formas criativas de equilibrar as coisas.
foreignData.name: Estacas Ósseas
foreignData.text: Como custo adicional para conjurar Estacas Ósseas, sacrifique uma criatura.Destrua a criatura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Оказавшись в ужасающем меньшинстве, зендикарцы нашли хитроумные способы уравнять шансы.
foreignData.name: Костные Осколки
foreignData.text: В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Костных Осколков пожертвуйте существо.Уничтожьте целевое существо.

foreignData.flavorText: 由于人数远远不敌，赞迪卡人用创意巧思拉平差距。

mainBoard.name: Bone Splinters
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Bone Splinters, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

rulings.text: Once you begin to cast Bone Splinters, no player may take actions until you’re done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the creature you wish to sacrifice.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you can’t cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you can’t sacrifice additional creatures.
